title: Dashboard coverage: functional tests for History filtering
description: Add functional tests that verify History filters change outcomes: project menu, event-type segmented control, and date-range menu. Assert row counts/content change with filter selection, not just control existence.

title: Dashboard coverage: Agent Tasks board interaction tests
description: Add tests for Agent Tasks dashboard interactions: create-task validation/success, completed toggle, task detail save/close behavior, and drag/drop reassignment path where testable. Include integration-style coverage for JSON parsing from real bd list payload fixtures.

title: Dashboard coverage P0: expose gateway session refresh failures
description: AppState.refreshGatewaySessions currently swallows all errors, which can leave dashboard/session widgets blank with no user feedback. Add explicit error surfacing and tests for failure and recovery paths.

title: Dashboard coverage: functional tests for Agents widgets
description: Add functional tests for Agents dashboard widgets: sessions stats chips, session table ordering/values, and handoff row expansion behavior. Cover both populated and empty states using controlled data.

title: Dashboard coverage: header/nav and panel state behavior tests
description: Add functional tests for dashboard-level navigation and state widgets: project header stats updates, tab switching behavior, right-panel collapse/expand toggle, and unread badge reset behavior.

title: Dashboard coverage P0: surface AgentTasks parse failures
description: Fix silent failure in AgentTasksViewModel where malformed bd JSON currently yields empty tasks with no error. Update parsing/load flow to surface an explicit error state, and add tests proving malformed payloads do not render as empty-success.
